mapper.sql: a.UUID AS "uuid", a.SYMBOL AS "symbol", a.TIMENUM AS "timenum", a.TIMEUNIT AS "timeunit", a.UNIT_AMOUNT AS "unitAmount", a.UNIT_MAX_AMOUNT AS "unitMaxAmount", a.PROFIT_RATIO AS "profitRatio", a.UNIT_FEE AS "unitFee", a.PROFIT_RATIO_MAX AS "profitRatioMax", a.create_by AS "createBy", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_time_ts AS "createTimeTs", a.update_time_ts AS "updateTimeTs", a.create_time AS "createTime"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_futures_para a
WHERE a.uuid = #{id} and a.del_flag = 0
